Create the Server and Ui Function for the Shiny App

init.Rd

Creates the server and ui part for a teal shiny app

init(data, modules, filter = NULL, header = tags$p("title here"),
  footer = tags$p("footer here"))

Arguments

data

named list with datasets. Dataset names are case sensitive. The `ASL` data is mandatory.
filter

filter settings. Nested named list, currently with init list element.
header

object of class `shiny.tag` to be used as the header of the app
footer

object of class `shiny.tag` to be used as the footer of the app
analysis

nested list with one list per analysis item with the following named list elements:

namestring with name
shown in menu for the analysis itemserver
required, shiny servermodule function, see
callModulefor more
informationui
required, shiny ui module function, seecallModule
for more informationdata
required,vector with datasets names that are passed on (filtered) to the server
functionoptions
optional, other arguments passed on to the serverfunction
elements

list with lists defining new pages (as for analysis) or one of the keywords data_table, variable_browser, analysis.

Value

named list with server and ui function

Examples

# NOT RUN {
ASL <- generate_sample_data('ASL')
ARS <- generate_sample_data('ARS')
ATE <- generate_sample_data('ATE')

x <- teal::init(
  data =  list(ASL = ASL, ARS = ARS, ATE = ATE),
  modules = root_modules(
    module(
      "data source",
      server = function(input, output, session, datasets) {},
      ui = function(id) div(p("information about data source")),
      filters = NULL
    ),
    tm_data_table(),
    tm_variable_browser(),
    modules(
      label = "analysis items",
      tm_table(
         label = "demographic table",
         dataname = "ASL",
         xvar = "SEX",
         yvar = "RACE",
         yvar_choices = c("RACE", "AGEGR", "REGION")
      ),
      tm_scatterplot(
         label = "scatterplot",
         dataname = "ASL",
         xvar = "AGE",
         yvar = "BBMI",
         color_by = "_none_",
         color_by_choices = c("_none_", "STUDYID")
      ),
      module(
         label = "survival curves",
         server = function(input, output, session, datasets) {},
         ui = function(id) div(p("Kaplan Meier Curve")),
         filters = "ATE"
      )
    )
  ),
  header = tags$h1("Sample App"),
  footer = tags$p("Copyright 2017")
)

shinyApp(x$ui, x$server)

# }
